Less than two weeks to QHacks 2018!

One week until QHacks 2018!

This is a reminder to submit your RSVP if you intend to come to QHacks 2018. We have now accepted hackers from our waitlist, so the remaining spots are available on a first-come-first-serve basis.

RSVP NOW

Given the high volume of hacker applications, we ask that if you can no longer attend, please withdraw your application on the QHacks Dashboard so you give someone on the waitlist the opportunity to attend.

In the meantime, stay tuned on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for announcements about cool events and prizes. If you have any questions, you can reply directly to this email or email hello@qhacks.io. We can't wait to see what you create at QHacks 2018!

See you soon,

The QHacks Team
